For those with stress level being high (B=1), the probability of mental health being high (C=1) is 0.1243. 
For those with mental health being low (C=0), the probability of education level being high (D=1) is 0.3934. 
For those with mental health being high (C=1), the probability of education level being high (D=1) is 0.2206.
